definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: In Chapter 1, the concerned symbolic literary theories are introduced here synoptically.
sentences.chinese: 第一章对象征文学理论进行了概括性的介绍。

sentences.english: Hu Yinlin of the late Ming Dynasty made quite a contribution to literary theory and studies.
sentences.chinese: 明朝后期的胡应麟在文学理论及治学方面颇有建树。

sentences.english: The great change of society and history has helped to bring about the philosophy theory to be flourishing as never before.
sentences.chinese: 社会历史的伟大变革铸就了哲学理论的空前繁荣。

sentences.english: Zhou Yang has a profound effect on the new Chinese literature theory textbooks.
sentences.chinese: 周扬对新中国文学理论教材影响深远。

sentences.english: For the time being , collateral obligation is only referred to as a theoretic concept which lacks systematic study.
sentences.chinese: 附随义务在目前仅是一个学理概念，且缺乏系统研究。

sentences.english: The second chapter of the Community News of the academic building.
sentences.chinese: 第二章介绍了社区新闻的学理建构。

sentences.english: Those academic grouping is of constructive significance to legislation and judiciary.
sentences.chinese: 这种学理上的分类对立法和司法具有理论指导意义。

sentences.english: During the Middle Ages, there were diverse variety of literary styles and theories in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 日本中世时期，文学风格与文学理论呈现多元化趋势。

sentences.english: It is profound that the theory has given contributions to the early Qin's literature.
sentences.chinese: 故孔子对我国先秦时期文学理论的贡献是深远的。

sentences.english: Some ancient Greek philosophy seems to derive from the Oriental theory.
sentences.chinese: 古希腊人的一些哲学理论似乎源自于东方。

sentences.english: P. R. China is a civil law country.
sentences.chinese: 我国的立法与学理传统基本接近大陆法系。

sentences.english: The first "literary theory" part has into two chapters.
sentences.chinese: 上篇“文学理论”分作两章。

sentences.english: We have a real use for literary theory.
sentences.chinese: 对于文学理论，我们有一个真正的用途。

sentences.english: His literature theory's distinguishing feature was virility.
sentences.chinese: 其文学理论，“阳刚”之论独具特色。

sentences.english: It is a Xue-Li about the relation between value and fact on the knowledge layer.
sentences.chinese: 在知识层面上就是价值与事实关系的学理。

sentences.english: The conception that man is born vice is poor as a theory and harmful in practice.
sentences.chinese: 人性恶理论从学理上和实践上都存有悖谬与危害。

definition: the sciences (as opposed to the humanities 文科[wen2 ke1])
science and engineering as academic subjects
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
